OracleEdge.comment: Accounts.onCreate() -> ListView.setOnItemClickListener() -> *Accounts.onItemClick() -> Accounts.onOpenAccount() -> MessageList.actionDisplaySearch() -> MessageList.intentDisplaySearch() -> Context.startActivity()
RemoteControlReceiver extends CoreReceiver -> *CoreReceiver.onReceive() -> RemoteControlReceiver.receive() -> RemoteControlService.set() -> Context.startService()
